nodes.text: The Denendre Valley was a valley on the planet Corellia. It was bordered by the Rhaler's Bastion mountain range on one side and by the Thaos Mountains and the Vella plains on the other side. A river flew through the Denendre valley until it reached the Riverlands near the city of Tyrena.
The Denendre Valley is one of many designated planetary regions in the MMORPG Star Wars Galaxies.
